entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rogersville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Blowing snow along parts of the coast overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow along parts of the coast in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
